creditline: Gift of George W. Rickey in memory of Edith L. Rickey
description: rounded body on tall, thick base; long, thin neck; beaded overall with primarily black and white designs, with red, yellow, blue and green accents; zigzag patterns on base and neck; circles with zigzags on body

title: Wine bottle with stopper
